page.title: 16SYSTEMS OF COMMUNICATION
page.content: Linkenholt has its own Post Office and Telephone Box, but there are very few houses with their own private telephone. In Faccombe every house has its own telephone but there is no Post Office or Telephone Box. There is a post box for letters in the wall of the Manor Gardens. Most houses in Netherton have a telephone. The whole area has 2 postal collections and deliveries each day. Citizens' Band radios are used on the farms as convenient communication between workers spread over large areas to give directions regarding work or to call for help in case of emergency. CB radios assisted the apprehension of sheep rustlers and poachers recently.
